(Cheong Yew Han ka apne rahasy kathaon ko rachane ka ek anokha tariqa tha. Vah aksar ant ko dhyan mein rakhkar shuruat karte the, pahiliyon ke tukde parikalpit karte the, aur fir apne patro aur pathakon ke liye ek akarshak yatra ka nirman karte the taaki ve charam samadhan tak pahunch sakein.)
